Header.Title: Murali Lakshmanan
Header.SubTitle: SAP UI5/Fiori Architecture, Design and Development
Header.ShortIntro: A passionate software engineer who has 8+ years of total experience in Fiori, UI development, Full stack development and Quality Assurance.

Summary.Point: SAP UI5/Fiori Architecture, Design and Development
Summary.Description: Expert Knowledge in SAP UI5/Fiori architecture, design and development
Expertise in Developing, Consuming & Integrating oData services with SAP UI5 / Fiori applications.

Summary.Point: Integration of SAP UI5 apps with Frontend & Backend ecosystems
Summary.Description: Expertise in integrating SAP UI5 application with Front End NetWeaver Gateway system and Backend ERP Systems.
Expert knowledge in identifying performance bottleneck, implementing optimizations and establishing industry best practices.
Excellent proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, CSS technologies. Sound Knowledge on ES6 & HTML5 features
Experienced in implementing end-to-end solution at customers’ location
Experienced in developing hybrid mobile apps using PhoneGap / Cordava
Designed and architected offline SAP UI5 applications and other UI applications by implementing Service Worker API

Summary.Point: Expertise in integrating 3rd party libraries with SAP UI5 Apps
Summary.Description: Expertise in integrating 3rd party libraries (like Highcharts, Moment.js) with SAP UI5 applications
Expert knowledge on developing custom controls and implementation. Custom UI5 themes design and implementation.
Experienced in Fiori launch pad deployment procedures

Summary.Point: Developing End-to-End UI5 application & SPA applications
Summary.Description: Experienced in developing end-to-end UI5 applications using MYSQL, OLingo framework & UI5 applications in Sales Order Integration with Finance and Payment terms.

Summary.Point: Node JS, Angular JS 1.0, Bootstrap, Jquery, Grunt
Summary.Description: Excellent proficiency in afore mentioned frontend technologies
Service worker, Web Worker, High Resolution Time, User Timing, Network Information, WebSocket APIs
Experienced in end-to-end quality assurance and testing. Have involved in various kinds of testing including functional, security and performance testing

Projects.Name: Bhavya Soft, UI5
Projects.Description: Bhavyasoft is a Jeweller in India who is trying to establish an enterprise application for their business needs. Customer is focused on extending their business and was looking out for enterprise solutions

Roles.Value: Open UI5 consultant and developer responsible for design and implementation of end-to-end UI5 application
Collaborate with customers, designed and developed an end-to-end solution
Designed a variant configuration management solution that simplifies the business challenges
Deploy the app in FLP and customize the standard themes to match the brand theming

Projects.Name: Aeon Products, UI5
Projects.Description: Aeon products is a fine offset printer and in-house manufacturer of cartons, bags, brochures and other various paper products. It is a combined resources of printing and packaging solutions. It has a employee work force of 100 members including technical and commercial staff. Organization has been in market since 2004 and its plants has been accredited with ISO 9001:2008

Roles.Value: Open UI5 consultant and developer responsible for design and implementation of end-to-end UI5 application
Collaborate with customers, designed and developed an end-to-end solution
Designed a variant configuration management solution that simplifies the business challenges
Deploy the app in FLP and customize the standard themes to match the brand theming

Projects.Name: Load & Performance Engineering ,UI5 - PayPal
Projects.Description: Load and Performance Team (LnP) in PayPal is the team that handles all the LnP requirements of PayPal projects. This team is responsible to certify PayPal products w.r.t load and performance numbers before the project hits live. They are also responsible to monitor live environments for any performance deviations

Roles.Value: Front end developer responsible for developing an application that caters the LnP needs of a developer as a service.
Architected and implemented the UI front using Open UI5 and Node JS
Migrated Vanilla JS project to Open UI5 and it was well received and appreciated by the management teams.
Designed and integrated 3rd party libraries like Highcharts, moment.js with UI5 application.
Implementing a hybrid app using Phonegap
Designed and implemented Service Worker API to achieve Offline app capabilities
Integrated Rest APIs with UI5 application
Designed and implemented live chart capabilities in UI5 application with the help node sockets
Customizing the Open UI5 themes so it matches the PayPal branding themes
Responsible for implementing MVC design patterns in UI

Projects.Name: Mertics - PayPal
Projects.Description: Metrics team is an internal team that handles all the metrics and analytics that are majorly tracked at org level. This team is responsible for reporting data that helps stakeholders understands the quality of the product, health of PayPal application in live w.r.t to our quality goals. The data that we are reporting plays a key role in defining the quality goals of PayPal every year

Roles.Value: Full stack developer responsible for developing an application that addresses metrics requirements from PayPal top management and leaders
Build Rest APIs that fetches defects details from JIRA and present the data based on the user needs (Current open bugs in Live, Defects that are our of SLA, Security related defects and so on)
Build an UI that gives data at high level (Graphs) and more granular level (Tables) so user gets the best of both worlds
Maintain the quality of the portal by keeping the defect count at the defined range
Implement CI so people can focus more on coding than other steps in keeping up the project
Write Test suites for all new changes that covers unit, integration and functional areas
Validate the accuracy of the data that we collect from various sources to build the reports
Measure code coverage and maintain the coverage above the defined level

Projects.Name: Application Security - PayPal
Projects.Description:
PayPal - AppSec Team: AppSec team deals with security related projects in PayPal and we have been mainly focused on improving the security of PayPal.  We build and deliver security frameworks for PayPal.  We also deal with live security issues as and when something (if any) pops up. 

 Besides our usual project deliverables, we also deal with different cross vertical teams every day, creating security awareness and help them bring in security into the product at the earliest

Roles.Value: Full stack developer responsible for building dashboard that captures all the live security defects which will collate and populate the all security issues and statuses in one place
Security Tester responsible for validating all live security issues (Bug Bounty issues) and assign to the respective teams, follow up with the dev team, suggest the fix and validate the code change
Automated and Introduced organizational level Test suite (Security Acceptance Test - SAT) that runs against every PayPal build before it goes to testers to certify it
Responsible for testing various Security projects / Frameworks that PayPal delivers
Roll out the framework and giving demo to cross vertical team in order to bring in the security at the earliest
Live Security Issue Support: Reaching out to the corresponding cross vertical team and help them understanding the issue. Help them providing an efficient fix and push it to live
Vulnerability Assessment testing for any new features in PayPal on demand

Projects.Name: EDT, EBay Inc
Projects.Description: eBay Inc. is an American Internet company that manages eBay.com, an online auction and shopping website in which people and businesses buy and sell a broad variety of goods and services worldwide. The majority of the sales take place through a set-time auction format, but subsequent methods include a substantial segment of listings in the 'Buy It Now' category

Roles.Value: Automation test engineer responsible for building and maintaining an automated test suite using Selenium
Responsible for establishing CI pipeline

Projects.Name: EarthLink
Projects.Description: EarthLink is an award-winning Internet service provider - ISP - with more than 14 years of experience as a dial-up Internet provider and over 10 years as a broadband Internet provider. Our low cost dial up access and broadband Internet services (DSL Internet and Cable Internet) have been given many best ISP awards, readers' choice awards, and other Internet service provider accolades based on the quality of our service and support. They also offer an innovative high speed DSL and home phone service bundle. Apart from these, they also offer many VAS products such as Toolbar, BART (Integrated Portal), PCC & ISP (Anti-Virus software)

Roles.Value: Quality Assurance Engineer responsible for certifying new releases and code changes
Test Plan and Test case document creation. Functional, Compatibility & Regression testing. Involved in Production support and release testing

Achievements.Description: Received SPOT award for my contributions in PayPal Metrics Portal application development
Received glowing reviews and appreciations from top management for successful Open UI5 transformation project in LnP team
Have been rewarded consistently and promoted twice for my contributions and ability to deliver high quality products

Strengths.Description: Quick Witted, highly charismatic and self-motivated individual
Ability to maintain the enthusiasm in the team which in turn leads to better productivity
Great team player. Smart and Flexible
